text: Aur wohi hai jiss ney aasmanon aur zamin ko bar haq peda kiya aur jiss waqt Allah Taalaa itna keh dey ga tu ho ja bus woh ho paray ga. Uss ka kehna haq aur ba-asar hai. Aur sari hakoomat khaas ussi ki hogi jab kay soor mein phoonk maari jayegi woh jannay wala hai posheeda cheezon ka aur zahir cheezon ka aur wohi hai bari hikmat wala poori khabar rakhney wala
